website_summaries.verdict: Popular brand and easy-to-use design that is built for fabrics and textiles. However, it comes with some typical concerns and a higher price than similar models.
pros: Powder-coated construction works well for punching holes in most textiles, leather, and other fabrics
Revolving hole puncher capable of creating 6 different sized holes
Made by a trusted name in tools
cons: Some tough materials may cause it to malfunction or break
Handles don't provide the best leverage

customer_reviews.title: Not the KNIPEX quality I've come to expect - very possible counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: If you have used German manufactured Knipex pliers, cutters, etc. you know they are exquisitely machined professional grade tools. This rotating hole punch is not in that category. Stamped sheet metal throughout, barely adequate manufacturing tolerances, and a rotation arrow that absurdly points in the wrong direction. The tool is marked "KNIPEX 90 70 220 Germany" and does an acceptable job of punching holes in .125" leather. OK for occasional use but NOT a pro grade Knipex tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice clean holes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for "whenever I need them". Finally got my chance when my wife needed some holds punched in a leather strap. Cut them beautifully, nice clean holes, and had a good feel to it when I used it. I rated them sturdy as build quality is solid. Can't tell how long they will last or if they will stay sharp but so far so good for a relatively inexpensive specialty tool.
customer_reviews.author: JiminCA

customer_reviews.title: Great device and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I show horses so I bought this to be able to punch holes in harness and halters. As a nice benefit, it also helps me punch holes in my belts! It's really easy to switch the hole size around and it's nice and sharp so you don't have to struggle too much to get the work done.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control  - Part Deux
customer_reviews.text: [Edited 6/12/2013] Purchased this item as I have the pliers set and am pleased with their quality. Not so with this hole punch! Two of the punches are damaged. Where is the German standard of manufacture and rigid quality control? ... ARRRGGGHHH! (That's the sound made by an unsatisfied customer.) Will exchange for another one. I'm keeping my fingers crossed. Okay, so after the minor hassle of returning the first one, I've received and examined the second one. It works fine! This is the type of quality I've come to expect of Knipex products. Edited the rating from the previous two stars (yeah, I was a bit peeved when I wrote the previous review :p) to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lynnsantabarbara

customer_reviews.title: Does the work!
customer_reviews.text: IT PUNCHES THE HOLES IN THE LEATHER OR IT GETS THE HOSE. it works, we’ll see for how long. Feels like a quality tool but not as industrial as some other punches I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I got these to punch holes in rubber seals at work and they work really well, but the material gets stuck inside the tub and I have to push it out with a pick. Works on belts, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with these. They do what they're designed to do at a reasonable price. AND I trust the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best leather hole punch I’ve found. I own many knipex tools and this doesn’t disappoint. Quality is as good as it gets for this type of tool.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Super Item
customer_reviews.text: I am a lucha libre maskmaker and have been for over 30 years.Through out that time I bought my share of hole punchers.Even when they were brand new they didnt work as good as this one does.I was sceptial of spending 22.00 dollars for this item.I was afraid I would spend the money for the same quality of item I already have,But this is worth the money.I am right handed and I broke my hand when I was a teenager and the hand never healed correctly so putting preasure on it just kills me.With this hole puncher its a cinch.It goes through vynil like butter even on multiple layers.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Quality control missed this one - Not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I really like the German made Knipex products, I have their mini bolt cutter and it is great, but these punch pliers did not meet my expectations. The large punch has two noticeable chips and the medium cutter that I need to use the most is duller then my 20 year old (made in England) punch that this was suppose to replace. Wish the cutters were sharp and not chipped. I was disappointed enough that I decided to go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: SDesign

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I used my Dad's leather punch when I was young and I remember it being a struggle to get the punch through leather. Using this punch however is more like cutting through warm butter. I wouldn't count my grip strength very high, but I didn't need much strength at all to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely, undeniably the best quality hole punch on the market.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Arrived on time. Good Product. Amazon is great. Prime is wonderful. Order one day and 2 days later it's on your doorstep. Almost like magic. Absolutely, undeniably the best quality hole punch on the market. Will not fall apart on the 1 st punch like cheaper versions. Your great grand kids Will still be using this one when you are just a memory. Don't waste your money on cheaper ones. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Freck Martin

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this tool will punch holes through concrete if I ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality. The lock is a little tricky at first to master because you have to close it at an exact release point of handles (hard to explain, but you'll master it after a few attempts). Solid construction, I feel like this tool will punch holes through concrete if I needed it to. Excellent craftsmanship. I just wish they would have labeled the punch sizes as well as list the punch hole sizes in the product/item description before "proceeding to checkout".
customer_reviews.author: Stonington Row

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best Knipex Product
customer_reviews.text: I use many Knipex pliers in my line of work. I have been extremely happy with the quality of Knipex pliers overall. I was a bit disappointed with the handle quality of the punch pliers. They are comfortable and strong enough but not up to the standards set by the rest of their lineup. The revolving punch wheel works as expected. I'm not sure you will find a better punch.
customer_reviews.author: Leemer

customer_reviews.title: Good guality. Should be the last set I need to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be high quality. But like many punches, you either need to put a small piece of fabric underneath or flip the leather over and cut from both sides to make a clean cut all the way through. I have not found a set yet that doesn't require this. But these do seem to be very good quality and I expect them to be the last set I need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and would buy another if something happens to this one! Misplaced the other one. I have had cheaper models that do not always cut all the way through the material so you have to play with the HANGING CHAD! You can even make your pattern out of paper and cut out the holes for the stitching and cut out where the threads go, again no hanging chads.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. Using for leather work. Rotary has a very nice and solid lock up compared to other ones I've had. Punch won't slide out when you're torquing it down. Punch also has very crisp and true cutting edges. If it holds this good for a few months that's more than I can say for other units.
customer_reviews.author: BurlapWhap

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Great puncher! I love Knipex tools. I didn't see any other heavy duty option. Given the amount of squeeze you have to put to a thick leather belt or any thick leather, I would fully expect anything built with thinner metal to completely bend after the 2nd or third punch. This is a sturdy tool that feels real and not like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: SparkyJoe

customer_reviews.title: Best. Great German quality
customer_reviews.text: Cuts clear holes. Very easy to use. Made in Germany
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, multable size punch holes
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hole punch for belts, leather watch bands and handbag shoulder straps Quick, next day delivery ... and very easy to use this product ... I'm not a large lady and I had many watch leather strap I needed to make smaller and just like that the job was done, I love Amazon they have Everything
customer_reviews.author: FussyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavy duty item
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, almost flimsy. Probably OK for thin/garment leather but if you're working saddles, sheaths, tool covers, etc... it's better to look for a heavier item. I'll buy something else and will have spent the money twice. Shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: Twodogs

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I always liked Knipex products, this one also works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: 3ee.info

customer_reviews.title: but they are basically built the same and will eventually bend at the joint like all the others do
customer_reviews.text: These are a little nicer than the other brands I have tried out, but they are basically built the same and will eventually bend at the joint like all the others do. These have a warranty and I hope these will be the last pair I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: high quality hole punch. don't cheap out and buy a chinese version.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I questioned myself buying this tool, how often do you need one...
customer_reviews.text: Certainly a nice tool to have when you need it. I figured if I was going to buy a pair I'd by good quality. Beautiful, top shelf engineering, perfect operation. I am going to etch my name and date on them, these will last generations if cared for...they seem that good.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Knipex is quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought one of these,excellent quality you would expect from Knipex. Tool works well as it should,I use it to punch holes in shim stock but ive tried it on many other things to and it works as intended,nice sized handles for those big hands. Only thing I wish they would do is put nice handle grips on them.
customer_reviews.author: fazzman

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.  Nice tight action.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to easily punch leather belts and other one-off uses. The punches seem sharp, so I protect it in my tools box from being bumped by other tools (pliers and crap).
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Walker

customer_reviews.title: We loved these so much
customer_reviews.text: We loved these so much, we bought two! Our Horween leather is so luxurious at Henry Green Leather that we have to squeeze extra hard to go through it in one attempt, but the Knipex is definitely up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: NG9

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Punch Pliers!
customer_reviews.text: These cost more than a lot of its competitors but paying the extra money is worth it. The puncher appears to be well constructed and does the job. I have used it on two belts and it got the job done without any problems. I waited for a price drop and scooped it up. Glad I did. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Legaleagle

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This tool works as advertised. I was able to add an additional hole to a belt and several watch straps.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sharp tool for putting extra holes in watchbands.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to put a good clean hole in a piece of leather, this tool does it well. The smallest size works for watch bands. The long handles provide good leverage and control. It seems sturdy enough for my infrequent use. A nice tool to have in the box.
customer_reviews.author: motogrin

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for paper punching. You can do a thick stack and get nice clean holes with this. It does help to push the punched paper up through the holes to make room for the next push.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Too Much

customer_reviews.title: but half of the punchers are dull. I don't know how to fix it because ...
customer_reviews.text: If it says Germany, that doesn't mean it is MADE in Germany. See the difference??? I don't know where it was made, but half of the punchers are dull. I don't know how to fix it because I am not sure yet how to take it apart,
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent revolving punch pliers at a reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: After loosing over 60 pounds I had to punch holes in several belts and various straps. The KNIFE 90 70 220 had all the hole sizes I needed made the job easy, even with punching holes in think bridal leather.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Knipex wins again!!
customer_reviews.text: Well Made High Quality Punch. I would expect no less from Knipex. I own and use many of their high quality hand tools. AAA+++ Here it is a year later and this punch is still going strong, like I stated in my first sentence Knipex = Quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: ... pliers I've owned in my lifetime and I absolutely love them. They are basic in design
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of hole punch pliers I've owned in my lifetime and I absolutely love them. They are basic in design, but the punch cuts through everything I throw at it like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Hacker

customer_reviews.title: poor design!
customer_reviews.text: I have sent back three pairs and the forth is no better, these start to fall apart as soon as you use them, where the wheel meets the body of the plier where the "axle" is flared starts to wear immediately metal shavings appear after the first revolution. This was the case on all four pair, I don't hold out hope these will last long...the rest of the tool seems solid knipex is a solid brand, this one missed the mark though.
customer_reviews.author: Roger T.

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp all purpose punch
customer_reviews.text: This tool was worth the three weeks it took to ship from Germany. dont waste your time and anguish with any of the other stamped junk punches out there. This thing tears thru averything and always is lined up! The Germans dont #*_ around! GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: riverplayer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product fairly priced.
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked fine on leather belts including some rather heavy one. Simple to use, the holes were clean and round and required only one punch per hole. A decent product fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Old Blue

customer_reviews.title: It will do.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this puncher to punch some holes in my belts due to weight loss. You still have to use a icepick to puncher it all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence parker

customer_reviews.title: Decent hole punch pliers.
customer_reviews.text: They work okay, but not as well as I was hoping. Need a pretty strong grip to get through belt leather. I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Braden

customer_reviews.title: German made, and of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: German made, seem of good quality. Not heavy duty, but not too light weight either. Should work out well. Anything USA or German made I buy, these won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Austen Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy product that does what it was designed for. Very sharp. My wife had no trouble cutting through some thick leather belts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: The punch sizes all cut through thick materials without fail. The edges were clean. I'm glad I paid a little more for this model after reading the favorable reviews. I concur that this is a quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: PNWrez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and precise. I can easily punch holes in cardboard, leather, and heavy webbing. Construction is much better than the ones found at Tandy Leather.
customer_reviews.author: Mudman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality of this tool is excellent. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend someone or buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Surguladze

customer_reviews.title: puts holes where you want them
customer_reviews.text: Knipex makes nice tools. Easily adjustable and works very well. Very sharp, leaves a nice clean hole.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it to put a couple holes in a leather belt, punched right through!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to make extra holes on a belt. It was great, fast, accurate. I want to find more things to punch.
customer_reviews.author: GPC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfiul German engineered and built tool WE USED TO MAKE ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfiul German engineered and built tool WE USED TO MAKE THESE IN USA OBAMA CHASED OUT ALL THE COMPANIES
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tool works great so far. Haven't used it a lot 3 or 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Sachmoh yo

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works and functions as described and likely to recommend provider to others. Good Bless You. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: and gets through even latigo and regular cow hides great.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and gets through even latigo and regular cow hides great.
customer_reviews.author: David Ruthstrom

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: High quality as one should expect from KNIPEX. Very well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This tool is well-designed and very sharp and seems to be built to last forever. One squeeze with little effort made clean holes through thick leather straps. This is clearly a tool made by a tool manufacturer, not a company that just makes craft supplies. The design is clean, the parts are perfectly aligned, and the tool is sturdy without being hefty.
customer_reviews.author: oneview

customer_reviews.title: works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: We use these rotary punches all the time for work. I have purchased one of these as others we have bought only lasted for a week or 2 and then failed. I bought one of the Knipex punches, and it works so well, I am buying another!!!!! Yeah, I highly recommend these punches.
customer_reviews.author: ken labelle

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheep...
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I expected, a little hard to punch holes with but for the price a great product..
customer_reviews.author: Otto A. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: No good for police/fire (heavy) belts
customer_reviews.text: Might work OK for light leather - watch bands, ladies shoe straps, etc. Would not punch 3/32" leather like police or fire dept. uniform belts. Had to return. Thanks to Amazon for their great return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Retiree

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: fell apart in the first few uses. Not accustomed to this brand of product being defective.
customer_reviews.author: David Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I bought two after making a mistake buying the cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knipex 90 a great German tool!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and well constructed. Look like is going to last forever. I would recommend this product to my friends and relatives!
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR E BASCUNAN

customer_reviews.title: Good and Solid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test out as I go through a bunch of these in a year. I was impressed with the weight, sturdiness and how well it punched through leather. It is a bit on the pricey side, but it is racing red, so that's cool! Overall, very good punching tool and worth the buy if priced under $25.
customer_reviews.author: 59 For Life

customer_reviews.title: ... stumbled upon this tool because I know knipex offers superior tools. I didn't even know this tool existed ...
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this tool because I know knipex offers superior tools. I didn't even know this tool existed before I would heat up a knife on my stove then press a new hole into my belts needless to say this tool does a much neater job.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: This punches leather very easily and is a quality tool. It is much better than the flimsy leather punches you can buy out of saddlery catalogs and tack stores. One thing to keep in mind is that you should punch the hole a little smaller than you think it should be since the hole punch itself will stretch the hole a little.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorlady

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work okay. Bought it for horse tack. I keep it in my trailer so I have not had to use it that much yet. I wanted to get a better brand for the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Bev B.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my needs. I work with 2-3 oz. Chrome tanned leather and usually punch 2-4 layers at most.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replacement. for 40 yr old punch that the pot metal center disintegrated. Looks solider and works well. pop
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: The tool is OK and amazon's service is perfect. Well
customer_reviews.text: The tool is OK and amazon's service is perfect. Well, it doesn't like a new one, some finger prints on punch handle and red paint had been rubbed on some places.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great products.
customer_reviews.text: I already have several Knipex products. Wire cutters and pliers, they are very well made and never seem to loose their edge. I am a professional Technician and I use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Locker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It works like it said it would. It is very strong and it will last for a long l time.
customer_reviews.author: Wid Wittya

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BOTHER..
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this item. When I received it, it had marks that showed it was previously used ( not NEW, as the listing stated, scuff marks and indentations proved someone previously punched something with it). The turn dial for the different hole punches is absolutely impossible to turn. I have strong hands and had difficulty doing it. If you value your time and money, look for something else. I needed this to finish some rush orders for Christmas and now find myself stuck again, looking for another rotary hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Saving money!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical as to how much I would use this item and whether it would give me the quality expected when punching holes in my belts. It is a time and money saver and really good quality. So easy to do on the go. Amazing tool!
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Are your tired of your Home Depot leather punches deflecting/bending when you have thicker halter leather? Buy this one. Stout old construction my grandad would have liked
customer_reviews.author: Ben Myers

customer_reviews.title: DID THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: Was able to punch through 3 tough nylon dog collars that I ordered in the wrong sizes. Very well made, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: nipex 90
customer_reviews.text: i haven't used it a whole lot but i will say it is a very well made tool, sharp clean punches and wit lil effort!
customer_reviews.author: frank berris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered TWO. And each time... a couple of the holes punch fine, but the other ones wouldn't punch. I feel that when you pay for a product, all parts of that product should work. I'm so disappointed, I just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: vvtmx

customer_reviews.title: Handy leather tool
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this tool. I use it for horse tack and my own belts. It is solid and punches cleanly. Great assortment of punch sizes. Zippy red color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie West

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Now I don't have to buy new belts. This tool is handy and easy to use. I highly recommend it to those who have small waists.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Great solid revolving punch tool
customer_reviews.text: Good and solid construction, sharp and easy to punch holes in leather, or any cloth garments, belts, bags... very handy for any small, or larger projects
customer_reviews.author: Quasar

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Well Made. Very Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Need this item to punch holes thru new canvas on our boat. Worked effortlessly. Sturdy and well made. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: EandOH

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tool
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to find tool, but if you need to make holes in leather or other similar material it is a must. Good quality as is to be expected from Knipex.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: high quality. easy to use. makes life so much easier, don't have to go take sheos and belts and purses to shoe repairman.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Yes, that's right. I hate it. I have another brand I like much better. I have other excellent tools by this company so I just had to try this one. I am in no way strong enough to squeeze this hard enough to punch a hole in the leather belt. While the other punch worked perfect with much less effort. Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pocket Wolf

customer_reviews.title: punch
customer_reviews.text: As I age, my belts seem to shrink...so, I needed flexibility. I had a belt punch that looked just like this one and I bent it squeezing too hard. I hope this one will prove to be stronger...although it seems to be the same thing just a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: does the job easily and well
customer_reviews.text: does the job easily and well. works on thick belts. more expensive, but like most tools, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jackie S

customer_reviews.title: good product but ....
customer_reviews.text: the pro: the punches are sharp, and the punched holes are clean the con: the packaging is sub-standard. with only plastic wrap, I can not trust this is a new item. one punch is missing. I returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Like the size for portability,like the color for finding it quick, it's a nice size for a smaller hand but not as sharp for cutting through leather as even my cheaper craft grade punch hold cutter Ive been using for 4 years , was expecting an easier ability to punch the leather. Not sure if I got a lemon or if this is how they are always. Guess I'll use as an extra puncher for adjusting things on the go
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: These are all the same generic pieces of crap sold by different names.  Knipex just doubles the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the same as another set I own which was made in England. The ones made in England fell apart literally and so will these. These cost twice as much as the ones made in England. I am beginning to think that the Knipex Company is nothing but a carefully orchestrated fraud. So far, everything I have purchased from them has turned out to be worthless junk.
customer_reviews.author: james f.

customer_reviews.title: good stuff, Made in Germany
customer_reviews.text: good stuff, Made in Germany, not China, so you know it is good.
customer_reviews.author: horace a. dier

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: KNIPEX 90 70 220 Revolving Punch Pliers by Knipex 36 customer reviews List Price: $31.66 Price: $23.39 You Save: $8.27 (26%) In Stock. Ships from and sold by Amazon.com. Gift-wrap available. Want it Sunday, Nov. 24? Order within 6 hrs 34 mins and choose Two-Day Shipping at checkout. Details For punching holes in leather, textiles and plastic material With six interchangeable punches: 20/25/30/35/40/50 dia With opening spring and locking lever Powder-coated for reliable protection against rust Punched and stamped from high-strength sheet steel › See more product details
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Seemingly good product...
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a well made tool. It worked fine for what I needed it for, with one small exception. It came used. The punches were filled with pieces of orange paper a previous customer had cut with it. They had mistreated the tool so badly that one of the punches tips was smashed. Luckily, it wasn't the size I needed. I had a customers work that needed a timely turnaround, so I had to use this punch. I didn't have time to send it back. But Amazon has some nerve sending me a used and partially broken product, labeled new.
customer_reviews.author: Jakeypie

product_meta.title: KNIPEX Tools - Revolving Punch Pliers (9070220)
product_meta.description:
Made In Wuppertal-Cronenberg, Germany. In Addition To Quality, Innovation And Performance, Other Important Cornerstones Are Sustainable Actions And Value-Guided Orientation.

AMAZON.COM


Revolving head with six interchangeable punches (view larger). Designed to punch out holes in leather, textiles, and plastic materials, this pair of revolving punch pliers from Knipex (model 90 70 220) includes six interchangeable punches — 5/64-inch, 3/32-inch, 1/8-inch, 9/64-inch, 5/32-inch, and 13/64-inch diameters. The 8-3/4-inch pliers feature an opening spring and locking lever, red powder coated finish, and oil-hardened tool-grade steel.

QUALITY IN EVERY DETAIL
Sometimes we give our pliers a really hard time. We try to destroy them to find out what makes them good and long lasting. Because we don't want to leave anything to chance, we take a long, careful look. 

The steel Knipex uses is precisely hardened with a maximum of 0.8 percent carbon and defined parts of chromium and vanadium, guaranteeing optimum cutting performance and service life — even though it requires special production and costs a bit more. But our high product demands require this.

The rivet of our high-leverage diagonal cutter also has to stand up to a lot of stress. That's why we literally give it backup: we forge it straight onto the pliers. This means extra effort as we have to precision mill the rivet to a few hundredth millimeters. But satisfied users are worth this effort.

Knipex also looks closely at the small details. The angles, the sharpness, the hardness, the toughness of the cutting edges. The precision and smooth movement of the joint. The handle design and the finish. We keep reviewing these subjects, we research, we test, and we improve our pliers.

ABOUT KNIPEX
Headquartered in Wuppertal, Germany, Knipex is an independently owned family enterprise steeped in tradition and specializing in the manufacturing of high-quality pliers. It all started back in 1882 when C. Gustav Putsch set up his own forge shop in Cronenberg (now a suburb of Wuppertal), and the company is now run by a fourth generation of that family. The world's leading brand in pliers today, Knipex is focused on the performance, service life, and ergonomics of its tools in order to meet the high expectations of professional users.

90 70 220 REVOLVING PUNCH PLIERS
AT A GLANCE
 * For punching out holes in leather, textiles, and plastic materials
 * Six interchangeable punches
 * Opening spring and locking lever
 * Red powder coated finish
 * Chrome vanadium heavy-duty steel, forged and oil-hardened
feature_bullets: The Number 1 Choice Of Tradesman Worldwide
Comfortable In Use And Quality Assured Design
Fit To Match The Needs In The Shop, At Home Or In The Service Field
Each Tool Is Proven And Tested For Durability And Function In Real World Use And Conditions
